results.title: Characteristics of Prescription Drug Fills Using Pharmacy-Pharmacy Benefits Manager (PBM) Discount Programs: The "GoodRx" Model.
results.text_hl: Commonly discounted products included generic treatments for @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic disease@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) and @DISEASE_Pediatric_acute_onset_neuropsychiatric_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C000631768 @@@neuropsychiatric@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Alprazolam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000525 @@@alprazolam@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000661 @@@amphetamine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Buprenorphine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002047 @@@buprenorphine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Hydrocodone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006853 @@@hydrocodone@@@) conditions.

citations.NLM: Curran J, Wang Y, Kang SY, Xuan A, Anderson G, Bai G, Alexander GC. Characteristics of Prescription Drug Fills Using Pharmacy-Pharmacy Benefits Manager (PBM) Discount Programs: The "GoodRx" Model. Value Health. 2023 Oct 23;():. PMID: 37879400
